name: Blizzard Strayer
description:
When you play a Talent card or a Character uses a Skill: Spend 1 less Cryo Die. (Once per Round)
Roll Phase: 2 of the starting Elemental Dice you roll are always guaranteed to be Cryo.
(A character can equip a maximum of 1 Artifact)
